docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: More twins will be born in the United States this year than ever before, according to statisticians, health-care professionals and organizations devoted to the study and support of twins.

headline.main: Baby Baby Boom Boom: Later Pregnancies Mean More Twins

docs.snippet: LEAD: More twins will be born in the United States this year than ever before, according to statisticians, health-care professionals and organizations devoted to the study and support of twins.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: INTERNATIONAL A3-19 A ban on Solzhenitsyn's writing in the Soviet Union will remain, the top Kremlin ideologist said, because ''to publish Solzhenitsyn's work is to undermine the foundations on which our present life rests.'' Page A1
docs.snippet: LEAD:  INTERNATIONAL A3-19  A ban on Solzhenitsyn's writing in the Soviet Union will remain, the top Kremlin ideologist said, because ''to publish Solzhenitsyn's work is to undermine the foundations on which our present life rests.'' Page A1
